definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
rice bowl/fig. livelihood/job/way of making a living
simple home-style meal/common occurrence/nothing out of the ordinary

sentences.english: I was having lunch with Galt at a French restaurant near her apartment in Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 我們在高特切爾西區公寓附近的法國餐館喫飯。

sentences.english: Wu Pan chooses or eat green meal.
sentences.chinese: 吳盼選擇還是喫青春飯。

sentences.english: The hungry man devoured his dinner.
sentences.chinese: 那餓漢狼吞虎嚥地把飯喫光了。

sentences.english: Hemingway enjoyed his lunches at the Course Restaurant, which is still functioning.
sentences.chinese: 海明威喜歡在賽場的餐廳喫飯，這家餐廳仍然在營業。

sentences.english: You two treated me many times before when I was looking for a job. Now I’m making good money, so it should be my turn.
sentences.chinese: 以前我在找工作的時候，你們兩請我喫過好多次飯。

sentences.english: He frequently to Wang Jing wage restaurant meals, and when the waiter asked her designated.
sentences.chinese: 他頻繁來王靜打工的餐館喫飯，並指定要她當服務員。

sentences.english: I feel too tired to go out for dinner . Let's eat in again tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我累得沒力氣出去喫飯，今天晚上我們還是在家喫吧。

sentences.english: Students eat huddled around makeshift coal burners for warmth.
sentences.chinese: 學生們圍在煤爐旁邊喫飯邊取暖。

sentences.english: You can also check your blood glucose before you eat a snack or meal.
sentences.chinese: 當然在加餐或喫飯之前，你也可以檢測你的血糖水平。

sentences.english: As soon as this was done, they cooked a meal oven an open fire.
sentences.chinese: 這件事剛做完，他們就在篝火上燒起了飯。

sentences.english: I'll just make a nice risotto .
sentences.chinese: 我會做超好喫的意大利飯。

sentences.english: Tyler never ate in restaurants, and Marla wasn't wrinkled.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒從來不在餐館裏喫飯，而馬拉也沒有長皺紋。

sentences.english: The patient is much better. She's got an appetite now.
sentences.chinese: 這個病人好多了，飯也喫得下了。

sentences.english: Then it flew to the butter-cask and down into the meal-tub and out again.
sentences.chinese: 然後，它飛到了酥油桶又下到喫飯浴缸和出來。

sentences.english: She makes sure he eats well and takes his medications.
sentences.chinese: 她還要確保兒子飯喫得香，並按時服藥。

definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
